statements: UPDATE FinancialData SET revenue = 1000.50, expenses = 500.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FinancialData SET expenses = 300.75, profit = 700.75 WHERE date = '2022-01-20';
UPDATE FinancialData SET profit = revenue - expenses WHERE date = '2022-01-31'
UPDATE FinancialData SET revenue = 15000, expenses = 10000 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1500.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE forecasts SET confidence_level = 0.85, predicted_closing_price = 1510.25 WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND date = '2022-09-16';
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1000.50 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE forecasts SET confidence_level = 0.75, predicted_closing_price = 1050.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 15000.50, expenses = 8000.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE forecasting_data SET sales_forecast = 25000.75, expenses_forecast = 10000.25 WHERE date = '2022-09-30';
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 50000, expenses = 20000 WHERE id = 100
UPDATE performance_metrics SET profit_margin = 0.25, liquidity_ratio = 1.5 WHERE date = '2022-10-15'
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 50000, expenses = 30000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET debt_ratio = 0.2, profitability = 0.5 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 1200000, expenses = 800000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET profitability = 0.25, debt_ratio = 0.55 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
UPDATE historical_data SET revenue = 150000, expenses = 90000, profit = 60000 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE financial_ratios SET roi = 0.15, roe = 0.2, roa = 0.12 WHERE date = '2022-11-20' AND company_name = 'XYZ Inc';
UPDATE historical_data SET revenue = 150000, expenses = 100000, profit = revenue - expenses WHERE company_name = 'Company A' AND date = '2022-06-30';
UPDATE financial_metrics SET profitability_ratio = 0.25, leverage_ratio = 1.5, liquidity_ratio = profitability_ratio / leverage_ratio WHERE company_name = 'Company B' AND date = '2022-07-15';
